distinct
,
from CASE_IMPORT
order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.insert: insert into CASE_IMPORT (IMPORT_ID, IMPORT_TIME, CASE_NO, CASE_NAME, INPUTER, INPUT_TIME, INPUT_UNIT, CASE_STATE, RECORD_SRC, LATEST_POCESS_TIME, PROC_KEY, INPUT_TYPE, VERSION_NO, IS_ASSIGN, ANFA_TIME, ANFA_ADDRESS, IS_SUSPECTED_CRIMINAL, CASE_TYPE, AMOUNT_INVOLVED, UNDERTAKER_SUGGEST, CASE_REASON, UNDERTAKER, UNDERTAKER_TIME, UPLOAD_FLAG, CASE_DETAIL_NAME, CASE_PARTY_JSON, CASE_COMPANY_JSON ) values (#{importId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{importTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{caseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{inputUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordSrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latestPocessTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{procKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{versionNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isAssign,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{anfaTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{anfaAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isSuspectedCriminal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{caseType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amountInvolved,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{undertakerSuggest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{undertaker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{undertakerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{uploadFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{caseDetailName,jdbcType=CLOB}, #{casePartyJson,jdbcType=CLOB}, #{caseCompanyJson,jdbcType=CLOB} )

mapper.update:
update CASE_IMPORT
IMPORT_ID = #{record.importId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IMPORT_TIME = #{record.importTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CASE_NO = #{record.caseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CASE_NAME = #{record.caseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INPUTER = #{record.inputer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INPUT_TIME = #{record.inputTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
INPUT_UNIT = #{record.inputUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CASE_STATE = #{record.caseState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECORD_SRC = #{record.recordSrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

IS_SUSPECTED_CRIMINAL = #{record.isSuspectedCriminal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CASE_TYPE = #{record.caseType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

CASE_PARTY_JSON = #{record.casePartyJson,jdbcType=CLOB},
CASE_COMPANY_JSON = #{record.caseCompanyJson,jdbcType=CLOB},

update CASE_IMPORT set IMPORT_TIME = #{importTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CASE_NO = #{caseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE_NAME = #{caseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INPUTER = #{inputer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INPUT_TIME = #{inputTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, INPUT_UNIT = #{inputUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE_STATE = #{caseState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECORD_SRC = #{recordSrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LATEST_POCESS_TIME = #{latestPocessTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PROC_KEY = #{procKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INPUT_TYPE = #{inputType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, VERSION_NO = #{versionNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_ASSIGN = #{isAssign,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ANFA_TIME = #{anfaTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ANFA_ADDRESS = #{anfaAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_SUSPECTED_CRIMINAL = #{isSuspectedCriminal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CASE_TYPE = #{caseType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AMOUNT_INVOLVED = #{amountInvolved,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UNDERTAKER_SUGGEST = #{undertakerSuggest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE_REASON = #{caseReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNDERTAKER = #{undertaker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNDERTAKER_TIME = #{undertakerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPLOAD_FLAG = #{uploadFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where IMPORT_ID = #{importId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
SELECT import_id,case_no,case_name,import_time
FROM case_import where upload_flag=#{uploadFlag} and inputer in (select user_id from user_ where post_id=(select post_id from user_ where user_id=#{inputer}))
and case_no like '%'||#{caseNo}||'%'
and case_name like '%'||#{caseName}||'%'
AND IMPORT_TIME >= #{startImportTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND IMPORT_TIME < (#{endImportTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} + INTERVAL '1' DAY)
AND IMPORT_TIME < (#{endImportTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} + INTERVAL '1' DAY)
AND IMPORT_TIME >= #{startImportTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
order by import_time desc
mapper.update: update case_import set penalty_file_id=null where import_id=${value}
